definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: To discuss the treatment to post-apoplexy depression with acupuncture of strengthening brain and regulating mind.
sentences.chinese: 探討健腦調神針法對中風後抑鬱症的治療作用。

sentences.english: The technique and maneuver abided by the mechanics regulation.
sentences.chinese: 針法和手法遵循力學規則。

sentences.english: The design can be worked in cross stitch.
sentences.chinese: 這個圖案可以用十字針法繡出來。

sentences.english: Ribbing in knitting employs both knit stitches and purl stitches to create elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 員工都在針織羅紋編織針針法和金銀絲創造彈性。

sentences.english: The observation group was treated with micro-needle at scalp hairline region; the control group was administered oral medicine.
sentences.chinese: 觀測組用頭皮髮際區微針法，對照組用口服藥物療法。

sentences.english: "Antagonistic acupuncture" is to acupuncture the antagonistic muscle of the spastic muscle, make it contract rhythmly with .
sentences.chinese: 本文運用“拮抗針法”改善中風後遺症的肌痙攣狀態。

sentences.english: Weaving methods have climbed from 18 to the present 40.
sentences.chinese: 蘇繡的針法由原來的18種發展到今天的40餘種。

sentences.english: The hemming method most frequently utilized in the sample room is the plain hem stitch.
sentences.chinese: 樣品室使用最頻繁的卷邊針法是包縫緣邊針跡。

sentences.english: This instrument can measure soil thermal conductivity quickly with thermal needle method.
sentences.chinese: 該儀器用熱針法可快速測量土的熱導率。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of a needle cervical plexus block in thyroid surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察一針法頸叢阻滯在甲狀腺手術中的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Just look at the tiny stitches and the lacework.
sentences.chinese: 就看看這針法和花邊吧。

sentences.english: The article adopt "antagonistic acupuncture" to improve spasticity after apoplexy.
sentences.chinese: 本文運用“拮抗針法”改善中風後遺症的肌痙攣狀態。

sentences.english: Maliu embroidery is known for its cross-stitch work and embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 麻柳刺繡以其十字花形針法而著稱。

sentences.english: The most common sewing machines use a stitch called a lock stitch.
sentences.chinese: 最普通的縫紉機用一種稱之爲雙線連鎖縫紉法的針法。

sentences.english: Catch stitch the edges of the underlining to the stitching lines of any darts.
sentences.chinese: 用三角針法緝縫襯裏的邊緣至省道縫止法。

definition: (TCM) observation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
Hua Tuo (?-208), famous doctor at the end of Han Dynasty
(TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse/to make such a diagnosis
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
